Description:                                                                                  
Command Line tool for windows-store operations                                                
                                                                                              
List of available options:                                                                    
install    Install a specific product                                                         
queue      Listen for progress notifications for a specific product or all queued products    
pause      Pause the given product                                                            
cancel     Cancel the given product                                                           
resume     Resume the given product                                                           
update     Check for updates for a given product or all installed products                    
hydrate    Download document for a given product                                              
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:                        <product-id>                           
Description:                                                         
Install a specific product                                           
<product-id>                  Catalog/Product:Sku:Bundle             
--repair                      Repair existing installated product    
--force-non-sd                Force installation to non SD           
--target-volume               Target Volume                          
--user                        User to install for                    
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:                                                                                                           
Description:                                                                                                     
Listen for progress notifications for a specific product or all queued products                                  
--product-id                                                                       Catalog/Product:Sku:Bundle    
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:                     <product-id>                  
Description:                                             
Pause the given product                                  
<product-id>               Catalog/Product:Sku:Bundle    
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:                      <product-id>                  
Description:                                              
Cancel the given product                                  
<product-id>                Catalog/Product:Sku:Bundle    
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:                      <product-id>                  
Description:                                              
Resume the given product                                  
<product-id>                Catalog/Product:Sku:Bundle    
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:                                                                                           
Description:                                                                                     
Check for updates for a given product or all installed products                                  
--product-id                                                       Catalog/Product:Sku:Bundle    
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:                                   <product-id>                  
Description:                                                           
Download document for a given product                                  
<product-id>                             Catalog/Product:Sku:Bundle    
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
